saveourplanet

Class SetUpGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • saveourplanet.SetUpGame

  • public class SetUpGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to set up the game board at the start of the main method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SetUpGame

        public SetUpGame(boolean workAround)

      • SetUpGame

        public SetUpGame()
          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        When instantiating an instance of the SetUpGame() class, the player count and player names will be asked for. These are stored in an ArrayList to be returned as necessary.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

    • Method Detail

      • initialisePlayerCount

        private void initialisePlayerCount()
                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Allows a player to set the initial player count. Business rules: range of 'MIN_PLAYER_COUNT' to 'MAX_PLAYER_COUNT' inclusive, update these constants as necessary.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • initialisePlayerObjects

        private void initialisePlayerObjects()
                              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Allows the user to set the names of each player. Passes its input to new Player objects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • createSquares

        private void createSquares(java.lang.String fileName,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Square> squares)
        Initiates the game squares from the .CSV file specified by fileName. If this fails, squares are set to the hard-coded default game values.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the csv file to read
        squares - the ArrayList to store the Squares.
